title: Ep. 379: Welcome to Gear Talk - MeatEater Network Debut
itunes:title: Ep. 379: Welcome to Gear Talk - MeatEater Network Debut
description:
As previously teased on the MeatEater podcast, Jordan and Janis take over the MeatEater feed and welcome you to the MeatEater Network's newest podcast, Gear Talk, where they explore their favorite -- and sometimes not-so-favorite -- pieces of gear. Later, they talk to First Lite's western big game guru, Matt Derosiers. 

Click here to subscribe to Gear Talk on iHeart Radio

Click here to subscribe to Gear Talk on Apple Podcasts

Click here to subscribe to Gear Talk on Spotify

Connect with Janis, Jordan, and MeatEater

MeatEater on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and Youtube

Shop MeatEater Merch 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
